mapper.insert: insert into kt_gene_detection_ways (detection_way_key, detection_key, way_cycle, way_price) values (#{detectionWayKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detectionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wayCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wayPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into kt_gene_detection_ways
detection_way_key,
detection_key,
way_cycle,
way_price,
#{detectionWayKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{detectionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wayCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{wayPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update kt_gene_detection_ways
detection_key = #{detectionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
way_cycle = #{wayCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
way_price = #{wayPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where detection_way_key = #{detectionWayKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into kt_gene_detection_ways (detection_way_key, detection_key, way_cycle,way_price) values
(#{item.detectionWayKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.detectionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.wayCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.wayPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT kgdw.detection_way_key detectionWayKey, kgdw.detection_key detectionKey, kgdw.way_cycle wayCycle, kgdw.way_price wayPrice, group_concat(DISTINCT i1.item_key SEPARATOR ',') orgsItemKeys, group_concat(DISTINCT i1.item_name SEPARATOR ',') orgsItemNames, group_concat(DISTINCT i2.item_key SEPARATOR ',') platformsItemKeys, group_concat(DISTINCT i2.item_name SEPARATOR ',') platformsItemNames, group_concat(DISTINCT i3.item_key SEPARATOR ',') sampleTypesItemKeys, group_concat(DISTINCT i3.item_name SEPARATOR ',') sampleTypesItemNames, group_concat(DISTINCT i4.item_key SEPARATOR ',') waysItemKeys, group_concat(DISTINCT i4.item_name SEPARATOR ',') waysItemNames FROM kt_gene_detection_ways kgdw LEFT JOIN kt_gene_detection_way_orgs kgdwo ON kgdw.detection_way_key=kgdwo.detection_way_key LEFT JOIN kt_data_dictionary_items i1 ON kgdwo.item_key=i1.item_key LEFT JOIN kt_gene_detection_way_platforms kgdwp ON kgdw.detection_way_key=kgdwp.detection_way_key LEFT JOIN kt_data_dictionary_items i2 ON kgdwp.item_key=i2.item_key LEFT JOIN kt_gene_detection_way_sample_types kgdwst ON kgdw.detection_way_key=kgdwst.detection_way_key LEFT JOIN kt_data_dictionary_items i3 ON kgdwst.item_key=i3.item_key LEFT JOIN kt_gene_detection_way_ways kgdww ON kgdw.detection_way_key=kgdww.detection_way_key LEFT JOIN kt_data_dictionary_items i4 ON kgdww.item_key=i4.item_key WHERE kgdw.detection_key=#{detectionKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY kgdw.detection_way_key
